title: Glider Lab
text:
Items to include:

Links to notes and SOPs
Descriptions of field computers used in the lab, and how to do necessary things from these computers
Glider deployment templates/workflows/checklists
Glider Database (Access file/SQL Server db) - when/how it is used, how to get stuff out, etc
Glider Pilot Tools, and related items

title: Glider Lab Manual
text:
The Ecosystem Science Division conducts research using gliders.
Current outline/working doc is here.
Ideas for things to mention here on the home page:

Link to Glider Lab GitHub project and issue-tracking repo.
Some type of table display of all deployments. Ideally this has links or some way of pointing to the data once itâ€™s on ERDDAP
Points to Fleet Status page
List team members and roles, to inform who to contact
